FuncDef:
The sub-domain command configures a BIER subdomain.
The undo sub-domain command deletes a BIER subdomain.
By default, no BIER subdomain is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a BIER subdomain.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 255.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a BIER subdomain, run the sub-domain command.
Prerequisites
BIER has been enabled using the bier command.
Precautions
This command is mutually exclusive with the LPUF-50/LPUF-50-L/LPUI-21-L/LPUI-51-L/LPUF-51/LPUF-51-B/LPUI-51/LPUI-51-B/LPUS-51/LPUF-101/LPUF-101-B/LPUI-101/LPUI-101-B/LPUS-101 board.
